verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s\f + \fr 1:1 \ft When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name (Hebrew “\+wh יהוה\+wh*”, usually pronounced Yahweh).\f* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Morasheth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, Ahaz, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*! \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*. \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w*\f + \fr 1:2 \ft The word translated “Lord” is “Adonai.”\f* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*,\f + \fr 1:3 \ft “Behold”, from “\+wh הִנֵּה\+wh*”, means look at, take notice, observe, see, or gaze at. It is often used as an interjection.\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* \w split|strong="H1234"\w* apart \w like|strong="H2022"\w* \w wax|strong="H1749"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w like|strong="H2022"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w poured|strong="H5064"\w* \w down|strong="H5064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w steep|strong="H4174"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

“\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* disobedience \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* disobedience \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*? Isn’t \w it|strong="H2063"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*? \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*? Aren’t \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

Therefore \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w like|strong="H8111"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rubble \w heap|strong="H5856"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w like|strong="H8111"\w* \w places|strong="H4302"\w* \w for|strong="H7704"\w* \w planting|strong="H4302"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w pour|strong="H5064"\w* \w down|strong="H5064"\w* \w its|strong="H7760"\w* stones \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w its|strong="H7760"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w beaten|strong="H3807"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* temple \w gifts|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8313"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w images|strong="H6456"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hire \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hire \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w shall|strong="H2181"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w wail|strong="H3213"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w stripped|strong="H7758"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w jackals|strong="H8577"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5060"\w* \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* incurable; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H5060"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w reaches|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Don’t \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* it \w in|strong="H5046"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*. Don’t \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w at|strong="H6083"\w* \w all|strong="H1058"\w*. \w At|strong="H6083"\w* Beth Ophrah\f + \fr 1:10 \ft Beth Ophrah means literally “House of Dust.”\f* \w I|strong="H5046"\w* have rolled myself \w in|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w*, \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Shaphir|strong="H8208"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6181"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*. \w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zaanan|strong="H6630"\w* won’t \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. \w The|strong="H3947"\w* wailing \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Beth Ezel \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* protection.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Maroth|strong="H4796"\w* waits anxiously \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Harness|strong="H7573"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w swift|strong="H7409"\w* steed, \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w parting|strong="H7964"\w* \w gift|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Moresheth Gath. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achzib \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deceitful \w thing|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* bring \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w conqueror|strong="H3423"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*. \w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*.

\w Shave|strong="H7139"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* heads, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cut|strong="H1494"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hair|strong="H1494"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w delight|strong="H8588"\w*. \w Enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* vulture, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w gone|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*!
